description:
Euphyllia is sick with fatigue from dealing with her new and unfamiliar lifestyle, but with Anisphia`s gentle nursing and warm words, she quickly recovers. Ilia tells Euphyllia about her own past and Anisphia`s true intentions, finally giving Euphyllia an idea of who she should strive to be. But then an unexpected urgent message arrives from the adventurers` guild...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hime-sama to Maigo no Ketsui Hyoumei
La princesse et l`enfant perdu, déclarant leur détermination
The Princess and the Lost Child Announce Their Decision
姫様と迷子の決意表明
